statements: SELECT * FROM RobotFarmEquipment;
SELECT equipment_name, equipment_type, purchase_date FROM RobotFarmEquipment;
SELECT equipment_id, efficiency_rating, performance_rating FROM RobotFarmEquipment;
SELECT * FROM RobotFarmEquipment ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, equipment_type, efficiency_rating FROM RobotFarmEquipment WHERE efficiency_rating > 0.8;
SELECT * FROM RobotFarmEquipment WHERE efficiency_rating > 4.5 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT equipment_name, equipment_type FROM RobotFarmEquipment WHERE equipment_type = 'Harvester' ORDER BY equipment_name ASC
SELECT equipment_name, performance_rating FROM RobotFarmEquipment WHERE performance_rating < 3.0 ORDER BY equipment_name DESC
SELECT equipment_name, efficiency_rating FROM RobotFarmEquipment WHERE equipment_type = 'Seeder' AND purchase_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM RobotFarmEquipment WHERE equipment_type IN ('Harvester', 'Seeder') ORDER BY equipment_name
SELECT * FROM RobotPerformance WHERE robot_id = 1
SELECT performance_metric, performance_value FROM RobotPerformance ORDER BY performance_value DESC
SELECT performance_metric, performance_date FROM RobotPerformance WHERE robot_id = 2
SELECT performance_date, performance_metric FROM RobotPerformance WHERE performance_value > 100
SELECT * FROM FarmEquipment WHERE manufacturer = 'John Deere'
SELECT * FROM RobotPerformance WHERE performance_metric = 'Efficiency'
SELECT robot_id, performance_metric, performance_value FROM RobotPerformance WHERE performance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-05-30'
SELECT r.performance_metric, r.performance_value, f.equipment_name FROM RobotPerformance r INNER JOIN FarmEquipment f ON r.farm_equipment_id = f.equipment_id
SELECT MAX(performance_value) AS max_performance_value, MIN(performance_value) AS min_performance_value FROM RobotPerformance
SELECT * FROM RobotPerformance ORDER BY performance_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM RobotEvents ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC;
SELECT robot_id, event_type FROM RobotEvents WHERE robot_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT event_type, event_timestamp FROM RobotEvents WHERE event_type = 'repair' AND robot_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY event_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM FarmEquipment WHERE purchase_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, equipment_type FROM FarmEquipment WHERE equipment_type = 'Tractor';
SELECT * FROM RobotEvents WHERE event_type='Robot Malfunction' ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC;
SELECT robot_id, sensor_name, sensor_value FROM RobotSensors WHERE sensor_value > 100 ORDER BY sensor_timestamp ASC;
SELECT equipment_name, equipment_type, purchase_date FROM FarmEquipment ORDER BY equipment_name ASC, purchase_date DESC;
SELECT event_id, robot_id, event_type, event_timestamp FROM RobotEvents WHERE robot_id='e58785ec-9716-4c9a-bba9-507be7dd2d73' ORDER BY event_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM RobotSensors WHERE sensor_timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND sensor_timestamp < '2023-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT * FROM Robot;
SELECT id, name, manufacturer FROM FarmEquipment;
SELECT id, model, year_of_manufacture FROM Robot ORDER BY year_of_manufacture DESC;
SELECT type, brand, year_of_manufacture FROM FarmEquipment WHERE year_of_manufacture > 2010;
SELECT robot_id, equipment_id, date FROM PerformanceData WHERE efficiency > 90;
SELECT * FROM Robot WHERE manufacturer = 'Robotics Inc';
SELECT id, name, model FROM Robot WHERE year_of_manufacture > 2010 ORDER BY year_of_manufacture DESC;
SELECT e.type, e.brand, p.date, p.efficiency FROM FarmEquipment e JOIN PerformanceData p ON e.id = p.equipment_id WHERE p.efficiency > 90;
SELECT r.name, m.date, m.description FROM Robot r JOIN MaintenanceLog m ON r.id = m.robot_id WHERE m.date >= '2022-01-01' AND m.date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM PerformanceData WHERE speed BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY efficiency DESC;
SELECT * FROM RobotFarmEquipment;
SELECT equipment_name, manufacturer, purchase_date FROM RobotFarmEquipment WHERE purchase_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_type FROM RobotFarmEquipment WHERE equipment_type = 'Harvester';
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceSchedule ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT equipment_id, malfunction_date, malfunction_description FROM EquipmentMalfunction WHERE repair_cost > 1000 ORDER BY repair_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM RobotFarmEquipment ORDER BY equipment_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT equipment_name, equipment_type, manufacturer FROM RobotFarmEquipment WHERE purchase_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT equipment_id, manufacturer, purchase_date FROM RobotFarmEquipment WHERE warranty_expiry IS NOT NULL AND purchase_date < '2022-01-01';

SELECT e.equipment_id, e.equipment_name, p.efficiency, p.average_speed FROM RobotFarmEquipment e JOIN EquipmentPerformance p ON e.equipment_id = p.equipment_id ORDER BY p.efficiency DESC, p.average_speed ASC LIMIT 5;

SELECT e.equipment_name, u.acres_covered, u.hours_used, u.location FROM RobotFarmEquipment e JOIN EquipmentUsage u ON e.equipment_id = u.equipment_id WHERE u.usage_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
